document.full_text: the frenchman who scored the tournament's biggest upset so far just two days ago ran out of energy and crashed out of the tournament wednesday, winning only three games in three straight sets.
document.title: after upsetting berdych, robert is ousted
lines_and_colors: the frenchman who scored the tournament's biggest upset so far just two days ago ran out of energy and crashed out of the tournament wednesday, winning only three games in three straight sets.
